website_summaries.verdict: When you want a plush cat toy that has an attention-grabbing look, this one fits the bill.
pros: Adorable shrimp character looks cute with plenty of fun details
Contains a catnip packet inside to hold your cat's attention
Curved shape in the toy makes it easier for your cat to toss and bat around
cons: Cat could pull off the google eyes, damaging the toy

customer_reviews.title: Great cat toy!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy LOVES this crab. We named him Craig. Craig also makes an excellent and stylish hat.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Impossibly tiny & poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Nearly $9 for a plush shrimp smaller than an actual "jumbo prawn" you could eat and more expensive than the real thing, too! Arrived relatively quickly..BUT.. One eyeball is TWICE the size of the other Stitching is sloppy and uneven. It's really poorly constructed. They don't show you the LARGE STIFF LABEL ATTACHED TO ONE SIDE AT THE SEAM, so once this gets pulled the whole thing comes undone.. This should be included in the seller's photos. Not only is it ugly and makes the toy look tacky, but it's the weakest point on the toy because of the construction. Doubt there's any catnip in this "toy". What a bunch of fibs.
customer_reviews.author: edg

customer_reviews.title: Best. Toy. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: If you follow me, MrBatmanCat, on Instagram, you’d know that my most favorite treat in the world is shrimp!! When Human found this shrimp toy, she just had to buy it! I absolutely love it. Purrfect for shrimp lovers like me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great friend for my pet with PTSD
customer_reviews.text: My cat was abused before I adopted him as a rescue. When he gets upset or scared, this toy calms him right down and he'll snuggle it until he falls asleep instead of having a little kitty meltdown. He plays with it more gently than his other toys, too, and always pulls it close and "hugs" it. Definitely a favorite for him, and it's super adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Taylor

customer_reviews.title: KITTY TESTED, KITTY APPROVED!
customer_reviews.text: I use to buy these online in the past. However they have been out of stock for awhile from other online retailers. Amazon had them in stock and available the next day! My kitties luv these!! They can carry them around in their mouth without an issue. Some toys are too big and they just swat them around. I usually replace their toys often to keep them fresh and clean. I always make sure I have a few extra on hand! This is one of their favorites and I will continue to make sure they have their toys!!!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality in the stitching and fabric. Super soft and firm for a good bite and kick. Perfect size to bat and carry around. My kitten absolutely loves it and I may buy more in the future. Very cute and durable toy that will likely be around for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna B

customer_reviews.title: 2 paws up
customer_reviews.text: My cat is obsessed with her "shrimpie" as we call it. Had to buy a second as a backup in case - gasp - something were to ever happen to shrimpie #1! About 2"x3" and very soft. Gets discolored easily if your cat is "active" with it (ha). So far, no rips or tears after about a year of HEAVY use. Bonus: other peoples' expressions when they find random shrimp toys lying around your house.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: A SOFT WELL MADE TOY WITH FLOPPY LEGS THAT OUR 13 Y.O. CAT ADORES!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy and later another as "backup crabbies". We have a (13) yo cat who is firmly addicted to his "original crabby". I have sewn Crabby together multiple times and washed him repeatedly in a lingerie bag. This toy is known as "New Crabby" and the second one I bought is "Backup Crabby". Our cat is devoted to Crabby but does play with these when Crabby is hiding. .
customer_reviews.author: Judy Hathcoat

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Favorite Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this cute little crab. He has a great time batting it around and throwing it up in the air. Looking at buying a second one in blue!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Ok, to be fair, this is a cat toy meant for cats. But it was so cute and tiny that I bought it for our chihuahua/ terrier mix puppy. I’ve purchased cat toys for my chihuahuas before that held up fine (years even!). Our puppy was able to rip it open in a day. Sad. But it is meant for cats, so maybe it would be alright for a kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Little Blue Crab
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat who likes to carry sea creatures (and *only* sea creatures) in his mouth and since his octopus was getting a bit ratty I decided to gift him this blue crab. He picked it up right away and ran off with it. 'Frank' approves!
customer_reviews.author: Smile SaurusTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Good distraction throwing toy.  Soft if stepped on.
customer_reviews.text: It's cute & it's soft if you step on it. Cats always seem to drag their toys into walking paths during the night. This toy is liked but is not an absolute favorite. Great to throw as distraction toy. Absolute favorite goes to a kong kickeroo mouse which is dragged from one room to another.
customer_reviews.author: Tally

customer_reviews.title: BEST CAT TOY EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT AS A GIFT FOR MY MOM'S CAT. HE'S NOT USUALLY A BIG FAN OF TOYS, WITH THIS TOY HE WALKS AROUND MUCH OF THE DAY-SHRIMP IN HIS MOUTH! RECENTLY, I HAD TO BUY A SECOND ONE BECAUSE HE BATTED THE FIRST ONE INTO A VENT AND WAS VERY UNHAPPY W/O THE TOY!
customer_reviews.author: ELEANOR

customer_reviews.title: Cute lil shrimpie
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but I didn't purchase this for any of our cats. Rather, I bought it as a random gag gift for my wife, although I forget what the gag was. All I remember is hiding it in her car, and her being surprised and amused by its discovery.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford

customer_reviews.title: My cats favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: This is my cats favorite toy his first one we still have it’s just the material he loves to play with it . I’m so happy I was able to find the same toy. He walks around the house with it in his mouth. So cute
customer_reviews.author: D. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving 3 stars because it does its job.. my cat seems to like it okay, she doesn’t go crazy for it like some other toys. I bought it because it’s cute, but I was expecting something bigger for $8. Unless my cat makes this her favorite, I probably won’t buy another shrimpie. If I would have realized the size before I bought it, my can would not own the shrimpie.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie buckley

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kitty and me
customer_reviews.text: I laugh every time I see my small cat carrying this from room to room in his mouth. We both enjoy it and he hasn't managed to destroy it in the couple of months we've had it
customer_reviews.author: Lh

customer_reviews.title: Cute cat toy for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little crab cat toy. It was reasonably priced, too. Cats like batting it around. Item was shipped out quickly as well. Overall, happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shop2much

customer_reviews.title: Leroy loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat Leroy loves this little toy. He bites and fights with it and falls asleep afterward. The toy is a little small but brings my cat joy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: The Cats Love This Thing!
customer_reviews.text: What a silly little toy. But our cats LOVE this thing--even though it contains no catnip like their other toys. The little crab looks just as pictured. Great find.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Sushi is tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: A lot can be said for this tiny blue crab. It's the first toy my new kitten took a shining too, and it's damn cute. It's very small, even for a kitten but it has a lot of personality. The blue crab looks a little like cookie monster. Overall very happy with Mr. Sushi.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves his Giraffe Snake!
customer_reviews.text: He absolutely loves it! He carries it around in his mouth and is definitely entertained! He was a street cat before I adopted him so he still has a hunt and play instinct. He is a rough player and had not broken his snake! Sometimes he leaves the snake in my bed as a “present” for me (so sweet!). As you can see, he is very happy with it. Definitely would reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cat toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted one of these shrimp and it is hands down the best cat toy. I ordered 3 more after finding them on amazon. She loves them so much. Hours of play. I don't know why but this is the toy 3 different cats will play with when all others sit left alone gathering dust.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Eicher

customer_reviews.title: My cat’s love it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 cat’s are spoiled with toys but needed a crab. It is a very cute toy and the kitties go bonkers for it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani De Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Too small :(
customer_reviews.text: The crab is cute as can be, but it is too small - even for a cat toy. I would recommend it for kittens more than adult cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cat toy and I especially like that there are ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cat toy and I especially like that there are no strings for my cat to chew off and swallow.
customer_reviews.author: J Deyarman

customer_reviews.title: Looks as pictured except size
customer_reviews.text: This item was much smaller than i expected. They should include a picture with other items for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy for my kitten
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kitten and she loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: NapQueen

customer_reviews.title: Party Game Toss Item
customer_reviews.text: I bought 9 of these to shoot from my hand catapault. I made a buoy and hung a hoop from it, and a seal you had to “feed”.
customer_reviews.author: William Drury

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not Interested
customer_reviews.text: Adorable....but my cats are just not interested in the cute little shrimp
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My cat is so in love. 1000000/10 would but again. So cute, great price. I’m buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The item is exactly as described and as pictured. My cat loves it. I will probably end up ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats favorite toys. Gotten more than one already!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality my cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My loves his little crab toy, he has a similar lobster one but its falling apart from years of playtime. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Jun

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cat toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my cats. They love them so much. They are always carrying them around. They love to bring them to me and put them on my bed when I'm sleeping. They are adorable. I also purchased one for my sisters cat and he also loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Emerich

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but....
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy, but it did not come wrapped from seller which could potentially effect catnip potency.
customer_reviews.author: girasoleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Puppy toy.
customer_reviews.text: Cat got to play with one day before the little puppy claimed it as his go to toy.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick A. Currie

customer_reviews.title: This shrimp is pretty cute, but our cat only plays with it ...
customer_reviews.text: This shrimp is pretty cute, but our cat only plays with it when she's determined to kill all the things and must leave no foot, woman, or shrimp unharmed.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Hickox

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I don't think there was enough catnip in this toy to get the attention of my cats. Either that or it is old nip. But, it's good for batting around the house when they get in their kicking things around mood.
customer_reviews.author: Miss_Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: The wonky eyes are just so cute. As soon as I gave it to my friend's cat, she loved it. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and frivolous - I bought this for me ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and frivolous - I bought this for me but the cat found it so had to take it to work. Now it's on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: compobeachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Cat toys.
customer_reviews.text: Gave them to my shellfish allergic friend for his cats. He thought they were hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Steele

customer_reviews.title: Fav
customer_reviews.text: My cat's favorite toy by far!! She has to take it with her on every road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: where's the catnip???
customer_reviews.text: I give it 3 stars because it is adorably cute but my cats barely play with it because there is ZERO catnip content to induce them to play. NOT a cat toy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Carol

customer_reviews.title: BILLED AS CAT TOY BUT SEEMS TO CONTAIN NO CATNIP
customer_reviews.text: I give it 3 stars because it is adorably cute but my cats barely play with it because there is ZERO catnip content to induce them to play. NOT a cat toy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Carol

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES this toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great Cat toy! My cat LOVES it! he has been going crazy over it for days now. My cat has a million toys but He LOVES this one. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne

customer_reviews.title: My cats' favorite toy! It's the right size for the kitties ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats' favorite toy! It's the right size for the kitties (other bigger toys could be a bit too heavy).
customer_reviews.author: jz321

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An adorable toy for our seafood loving cat! Perfect size, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Mcbunny

customer_reviews.title: Cute but boring.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute toy, but not a lot of fun for them to play with. "Hank" gets little attention.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: If you’re cat eats crab legs...
customer_reviews.text: My kitten tore off and ate a leg within the first 2 days of having it.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Shrimpies
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it and my little Poms love them too. I ordered 3 and when those are "done", I will order more. As of now, they are still in great shape and still a great toy for my "kids".
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Finkel

customer_reviews.title: These are so cute. I actually bought them to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. I actually bought them to use with a story called Grandma's Gumbo." We read the story and put all of the pretend ingredients in a big gumbo pot.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, but not worth $7, If it cost $3 i would buy a dozen!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has an obsession with shrimp. It doesn't matter if they are in toy form, dried or fresh she HAS to have them. Do you know how hard it is to buy a plush shrimp? I bought one from petsmart 2 years ago and it it the only toy that survived that she still carries around to the day. Sadly.. "little shrimpy" is not looking so good these days so i wanted to get another. The cat was thrilled, i just don't think for the size (smaller then 2") is with the $7+ that i paid for it. If you mark these down to $3 or so i will order a dozen!
customer_reviews.author: Storm Girl

customer_reviews.title: adorable!
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute and my kitties love them! I think every kitty should have one or two!.....or three.....or four :)
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia and the Kitties

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy!
customer_reviews.text: My cats fight over these toys! They're incredibly cute and soft.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Todd

customer_reviews.title: nicely made toy -- my cats just weren't into it
customer_reviews.text: nicely made toy -- my cats just weren't into it. ( But your cats might like it -- you know. Cats) --- update: And of course, after I wrote this review, they started playing with it :) (Cats.)
customer_reviews.author: LissaCat

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, my cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun, cute toy that my cat absolutely loves! I got it because she loves to eat cocktail shrimp, so I thought it would be a cute toy for her. I am glad to say it has become one of her favorites - and not one of the ones she ignores. My cat is not effected by Catnip, so I am assuming she loves the shape/etc. of the toy.
customer_reviews.author: cldsk

customer_reviews.title: My cats are in love!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love this little shrimpie!! They immediately started to rub their bodies all over it and they won't leave it alone. I've looked everywhere for a shrimp toy for my cats and I'm so happy that I found this one. The price is legit and the shipping was really quick. I am considering ordering more 😊
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Rogalla

customer_reviews.title: Cute Shrimp - but only one per order!!:(
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this stuffed shrimp! But, you only get one shrimp in the order! I thought I would receive what was pictured which is several.
customer_reviews.author: Afd

product_meta.title: Doggles Cat Toy
product_meta.description: Color:Sushi Shrimp PinkAdorable Plush Sushi! Cat owners will love these unique and cute cat toys! Polyfill with a catnip packet inside.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
